body: In the case of print(a, (b, c)) this would throw an error if we don't lower all of the tuples. As a temporary measure I was thinking it would be better to lower all tuples, instead of throwing an error
body_html: In the case of print(a, (b, c)) this would throw an error if we don't lower all of the tuples. As a temporary measure I was thinking it would be better to lower all tuples, instead of throwing an error
body_text: In the case of print(a, (b, c)) this would throw an error if we don't lower all of the tuples. As a temporary measure I was thinking it would be better to lower all tuples, instead of throwing an error
